Constricting Coils.name: Constricting Coils
Constricting Coils.flavor: You wrap your enemy in your coils, slowly crushing it.
Constricting Coils.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target is grabbed. Until the end of your next turn, while you are grabbing the target, you gain a +5 power bonus to all defenses, and any attack that misses you hits the target.

Fazing Fangs.name: Fazing Fangs
Fazing Fangs.flavor: You call serpent spirits that sink their fangs deep and deliver a poison that stupefies your foes and punishes them for their attacks.
Fazing Fangs.onHit: 3d8 poison damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). Until this effect ends, the target takes 10 poison damage whenever it attacks.
Fazing Fangs.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Serpent's Dash.name: Serpent's Dash
Serpent's Dash.flavor: You slither off, causing your enemies to lose track of you as you mask yourself in shadow.
Serpent's Dash.effect: You shift 3 squares and gain concealment until the end of your next turn.
